label_trash_desc: Notes in the trash will be deleted after 7 days.
label_user_settings_desc: You can change your username and password.
label_note_password_settings_desc: You can set a password to lock your notes.
label_delete_label_confirm_desc: This label has been added to a note. Are you sure you want to delete it?
label_language_settings_desc: You can set the language used within the app.
label_upload_desc: Downloaded data can be registered in the database.
mmessage_login_failed: Login failed. Please check your username and password.
message_label_must_be_unique: Label name must be unique. Please specify a different label name.
message_labelname_is_too_long: Label name is too long. Please specify within 8 characters.
message_new_notepassword_must_be_set: Please enter a new note password
message_current_notepassword_must_be_set: Please enter the current note password
message_error_occured_redirect_login: An error has occurred. Please log in again.
message_username_or_password_must_be_set: Please enter either a username or password
message_new_password_must_be_set_when_ch: When changing the password, please enter the current password
message_cannot_lock_note_without_notepas:
The note cannot be locked because no note password has been set.
Please set a note password.
message_notepassword_must_be_set_to_unlo: To unlock the note, a note password must be set.
message_incorrect_password: The password is incorrect. Please enter it again.
message_must_set_title_or_content: To register a note, enter either the title or the content.
